document.full_text: sri lanka's leader rejected calls for a war crimes probe at a public protest on sunday against a u.n. finding of "credible evidence" government forces committed atrocities when crushing tamil tiger guerrillas in 2009.
document.title: sri lankan leader spurns u.n. call for war crimes probe
lines_and_colors: sri lanka's leader rejected calls for a war crimes probe at a public protest on sunday against a u.n. finding of "credible evidence" government forces committed atrocities when crushing tamil tiger guerrillas in 2009.
